ac: 19, touch 14, flat-footed 16 (+4 armor, +3 Dex, +1 natural, +1 size)
other_gear: chain shirt, mwk spear, sling, 8 gp
feats: Brew Potion, Extra Bombs, Throw Anything

sections.body: During Combat The kobold uses her mutagen and extracts to strengthen her defense, and throws bombs at her enemies.
sections.name: Tactics

special_qualities: alchemy (alchemy crafting +2, identify potions), crafty, mutagen (+4/-2, +2 natural, 20 minutes), poison use
name: Kobold Bomber
skills: Acrobatics +3, Craft (trapmaking) +9, Disable Device +6, Escape Artist +3, Knowledge (engineering) +4, Perception +3, Profession (miner) +3, Stealth +10
combat_gear: potion of invisibility, acid, alchemist's fire (3)
